## CANSEC HURRICANE ACCESS CONTROL SYSTEMS REPAIR, MAINTENANCE AND INSTALLATION SERVICES FOR ESDC'S NCR LOCATIONS

### Solicitation Details

* **Tender Reference Number**: cb-380-82399260
* **Amendment Number**: 6
* **Solicitation Number**: 100024469
* **Publication Date**: 2023-11-02
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-12-04T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 2023-12-04

### Tender Description

Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) is seeking a contractor to provide repair, maintenance, and installation services for the Cansec Hurricane Access Control Systems at its National Capital Region (NCR) locations.

The contractor will be responsible for maintaining the systems to ensure optimal performance, testing to identify issues, repairing when there is an imminent or realized failure, and replacing when deemed obsolete or no longer effective. The contract period will be from the date of contract award and up to one year thereafter, including 4 option periods of 1 year each.

### Requirements

* The contractor must have the capacity and certifications to maintain and repair the existing Hurricane access control systems and any Legacy software/hardware that has reached its end-of-life service.
* The contractor will be responsible for maintaining and repairing all components of the access control systems, including building access and alarm intrusion detection tools.
* The contractor must be able to test and identify issues with the systems, and repair or replace them as necessary.
* The contractor will be required to provide detailed reports and documentation on all maintenance and repair activities.
